name: WinZO: Solitaire & Money Games
description:
WinZO Games offers a wide range of skill-based games, including casual, arcade, card games, and more. It has 20+ money games like Solitaire, FreeCell, Rummy, Carrom, Candy Match, Fruit Samurai etc. Play these easy games and win real money up to $10,000. You can also play free games & win prizes and cash rewards.



QUICK REASONS TO DOWNLOAD WINZO



1- We are the world's leading platform to play real money games on the App Store.
2- Play free games or add a boot amount of your choice.
3- 100% safe & secure with instant withdrawals.
4- Win cash prizes up to $10000.
5- Withdraw your winnings securely through PayPal, Credit Cards and Bank transfer.
6- Become a WinZO superstar and get upto $2000 per month.



GAMES: CHOOSE YOUR BEST GAMES FOR FUN-FILLED HOURS!



WinZO offers a variety of real money games like casual games, card games, action games, racing games, arcade, etc. in single-player and multiplayer modes.



1. CARD GAMES



Solitaire: Become a solitaire legend & experience the smoothest solitaire on iphone.
Rummy: Capture the best Rummy experience ever and win real cash.
Free-cell: The classic card games to escape the mundane.

All Card games have multiple personalized leaderboards, so double your cash winnings!


2. CASUAL GAMES


Fruit Samurai: Slash the fruits in an ultimate ninja style & win real money.
Candy Match: Match at least three candies and win rewards.
Knife Up: Thrash the board with a knife and score high.
Carrom: The classic board game played with a striker, in which the Queen rules the mind.


3. ARCADE GAMES:


Snake Rush: Collect more points with your snake and aim for the win real money
.
Stupid Birds: Save the eggs from these angry stupid birds attacking the nest. The birds are angry and fast but you can be faster.
Bubble Shooter: Reach the top by shooting the same color bubbles.


4. SPORTS GAMES:


Cricket: Beat the batting score of opponents and win in simple yet exciting cricket games.
Archery: Aim, shoot, and take home your winning cash.
Pool 3D: Become the ultimate Pool star with exclusive shots.


TEAM GAMES

WINZO WORLD WAR:

Play gaming tournaments daily of your favorite games, chat with your teammates, strategize and win cash up to $10,000


WINZO SPINNER:

Complete Spinner streaks to win bonuses and exciting rewards! More than 10,000 people have already won it.


In case of any query, the players can reach out at support@winzogames.com anytime.
